thread.section_title: Road Runner Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Road Runner Sports | www.roadrunnersports.com
thread.title: Karen
thread.title_full: Road Runner Sports reviewed by Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text:
This is my second time ordering from road runner. Their prices are great but what sold me was the 1st time I ordered. I had a computer glitch and called customer service. They straightened out my order and continued to provide knowledgeable information about my purchase. That's why I'm back! Other stores carry the same brands but how can you beat great prices and a superior customer service staff. Oh and the product ships fast!! Become a VIP member!!!
Karen, MO
